DOC.brief_summary: The present study is a feasibility study to assess the safety and efficacy of wireless capsule endoscope and compare the data obtained with those obtained by using a conventional esophagogastroduodenoscopy. The product was developed and manufacture in China.(the NaviCam. AKC-1.China)
DOC.brief_title: Remote-controlled Capsule Endoscopy: a Feasibility Study
